issue.title: Document Error?
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1098](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1098). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
in the "format/Layout.md" instruction file, the part which title is "Example layout: SparseUnion<u0: Int32, u1: Float, u2: List<Char>>": 
 \* children arrays:
the value buffer of "u0" field, it's "Bytes 0-3" respective value should be 5?

the detail info as the follow attachment jpg.

There is a word spell error in the part which title is "Dictionary encoding":
 The Dictionary is received as a DictionaryBacth whose id is referenced by a dictionary attribute defined in the metadata (Message.fbs) in the Field table. 
The word "DictionaryBacth" should be "DictionaryBatch".
